item.description: ã€Enhance your application by adding secure user profile editing with Microsoft Entra External ID. Microsoft Entra External ID provides simple integration for secure user authentication and profile management, offering custom branded sign-up experiences and efficient user management. item.title: ã€Querying the PIX Timing Capture file formatã€‘æŸ¥è¯¢PIXæ—¶åºæ•è·æ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼
item.description: ã€The Timing Capture file format is a Sqlite database. Â Queries written in standard SQL syntax can be used to extract data from Timing Capture files to perform a variety of analysis tasks without requiring the PIX user interface. PIX on Windows includes a Sqlite extension that simplifies the queries for common tasks such as determining the duration and execution times for a PIX event,ã€‘æ—¶åºæ•è·æ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼æ˜¯ Sqlite æ•°æ®åº“ã€‚ Â ä»¥æ ‡å‡† SQL è¯­æ³•ç¼–å†™çš„æŸ¥è¯¢å¯ç”¨äºä»æ—¶åºæ•è·æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­æå–æ•°æ®ï¼Œä»¥æ‰§è¡Œå„ç§åˆ†æä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œè€Œæ— éœ€ PIX ç”¨æˆ·ç•Œé¢ã€‚ Windows ä¸Šçš„ PIX åŒ…å«ä¸€ä¸ª Sqlite æ‰©å±•ï¼Œå¯ç®€åŒ–å¸¸è§ä»»åŠ¡çš„æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ç¡®å®š PIX äº‹ä»¶çš„æŒç»­æ—¶é—´å’Œæ‰§è¡Œæ—¶é—´ï¼Œ
